data.name: Potion-Maker's Apprentice
data.detailed_description:
A SHORT WALKABOUT GAME BY ALEX P.

Play as the forgetful apprentice in this cozy, choose-your-own adventure set in a fantastical potion shop. It's up to you to keep the business running smoothly while your mentor’s out of town for the weekend.
EXCEPT - you can barely remember anything! Not to mention that the cat familiars wrecked the storage room upstairs and destroyed the book of potion recipes in the process. Snoop around and figure out if this can all be chalked up to nerves…
OR if this mess was planned...

KEY FEATURES:


  • Explore the shop at your own pace—there’s no need to rush! Take a moment to pet the cats at the very least.

  • Gather ingredients and search for recipe pages scattered around. Solve the simple puzzles of potion crafting.

  • Chat with a kooky cast of customers. Will your service skills be spot on, or are you the type to cause some mischief if given the chance?

  • Sell potions and see where your choices lead you—experience multiple outcomes each playthrough.
  • A laid-back, magical time to be had with plenty of dumb jokes.

Estimated completion time: 1 - 2 hours ( single-setting game)

FOLLOW GAME DEVELOPMENT ON TIKTOK:

Tag along as I bring this indie game to life in an earthly realm near you!
https://www.tiktok.com/@mocha.misfit?lang=en

Thanks for reading! See ya around, Apprentice!
